document_data.caption: ''Barton, in a [[Temple of Jergal (Sword Coast)|crypt]] in the Sword Coast.''
document_data.name: Barton
document_data.mainbody: '''Barton''' was a looter who was active in the [[Western Heartlands]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]]. For a time, he was under the employ of [[Gimblebock]].
document_data.Possessions: He wore a suit of leather armor and used a [[bow]] when in combat.
document_data.History: In the 1490s [[DR]], Barton and his fellow looter, [[Mari (looter)|Mari]], had been trying to break into a crypt for a few days. They had made some progress, and had encountered [[skeleton]]s. Not wanting to go home empty handed yet again, he was determined to get further in.
